feed.title: Britain's Competition Appeal Tribunal grants adjournment on Microsoft-Activision deal
feed.summary: LONDON, July 21 ( Reuters ) - Britain's Competition Appeal Tribunal granted the adjournment application which was requested jointly by the antitrust regulator, the CMA, and Microsoft ( MSFT.O ) , as part of the latter's plan to try to buy Activision Blizzard ( ATVI.O ) .

feed.title: Wall Street heavyweights mixed ahead of Nasdaq 100 rebalance
feed.summary: July 21 ( Reuters ) - Shares of Wall Street's most valuable companies were mixed on Friday ahead of a rebalance of the Nasdaq 100 index ( .NDX ) to address the benchmark's "overconcentration."

feed.title: With Microsoft's Activision Blizzard Merger Cleared, Is Electronic Arts Stock a Buy?
feed.summary: EA trades at a lower valuation than Activision Blizzard and has valuable recurring revenue streams from sports titles.
